params._maxCycle: number of instructions until the machine is forcibly halted
params._picoSecondsToRunInsn: time the offchain will take to run one instruction

params._finalTime: max cycle of the machine for that computation
params._initialHash: hash in which both claimer and challenger agree on

params.leftPoint: confirmation of the leftPoint of the interval to be split. Should be an aggreement point.
params.queryPiece: is the index of queryArray corresponding to the left limit of the next interval to be queried.
params.rightPoint: confirmation of the rightPoint of the interval to be split. Should be a disagreement point.

params._divergenceTime: The time when the divergence happended. It should be a point of aggreement, while _divergenceTime + 1 should be a point of disagreement (both queried).

params.postedHashes: An array (of size querySize) with the hashes corresponding to the queried times
params.postedTimes: An array (of size querySize) with the times that have been queried.

makeQuery(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Makes a query (only challenger can call it).

presentDivergence(uint256,uint256).notice: Present a precise time of divergence (can only be called by challenger).

replyQuery(uint256,uint256[],bytes32[]).notice: Answer the query (only claimer can call it).
